description.value:
Whenever you finish a Long Rest, choose one type of land: arctic, coast, desert, forest, grassland, mountain, swamp, or underdark. Consult the table below that corresponds to the chosen type; you have the spells listed for your Druid level and lower prepared.

Arctic Land
Druid LevelCircle Spells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHoldPerson]{Hold Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpikeGrowt]{Spike Growth}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSleetStorm]{Sleet Storm}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSlow000000]{Slow}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFreedomOfM]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplIceStorm00]{Ice Storm}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCommuneWit]{Commune with Nature}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplConeOfCold]{Cone of Cold}
Coast Land
Druid LevelCircle Spells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMirrorImag]{Mirror Image}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWaterBreat]{Water Breathing}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplWaterWall0]{Water Walk}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplControlWat]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFreedomOfM]{Freedom of Movement}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMislead000]{Mislead}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplScrying000]{Scrying}

3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlur000000]{Blur}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSilence000]{Silence}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCreateFood]{Create Food and Water}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplProtFromEn]{Protection from Energy}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlight0000]{Blight}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHallucinat]{Hallucinatory Terrain}

9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCreation00]{Creation}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTreeStride]{Tree Stride}
